post:
Get early access to the KVM plans we’re planning to launch this 2020. Pay annually and you’ll get double the RAM and swap*, pay using crypto and you’ll get double the storage* (only valid for this promo).

Please open a ticket after ordering to avail of the free upgrades. These require manual intervention from our support team, and will be issued within 24 to 48 hours upon order approval.

KVMCA1G

  • 20 GB Storage (40GB if paid via crypto)
  • 1 GB RAM (2 GB if annual payment)
  • 1 GB swap (2 GB if annual payment)
  • 1 Fair-Share vCPU
  • 1 TB Bandwidth (250Mbps, rate limited to 10Mbps once exceeded and will reset on the next cycle)
  • 1 IPv4, 1 IPv6
    Price: $3.50/mo
    Only 2 in stock
    Order Now

KVMCA2G

  • 40 GB Storage (80GB if paid via crypto)
  • 2 GB RAM (4 GB if annual payment)
  • 2 GB swap (4 GB if annual payment)
  • 2 Fair-Share vCPU
  • 1 TB Bandwidth (250Mbps, rate limited to 10Mbps once exceeded and will reset on the next cycle)
  • 1 IPv4, 1 IPv6
    Price: $5/mo
    Only 2 in stock
    Order Now

KVMCA4G

  • 60 GB Storage (120GB if paid via crypto)
  • 4 GB RAM (8 GB if annual payment)
  • 4 GB swap (8 GB if annual payment)
  • 4 Fair-Share vCPU
  • 1 TB Bandwidth (250Mbps, rate limited to 10Mbps once exceeded and will reset on the next cycle)
  • 1 IPv4, 1 IPv6
    Price: $7/mo
    Only 2 in stock
    Order Now

Offer Notes:

  • All offers are KVM instances (run your own kernel)
  • Custom ISOs supported, upload your own via the client area
  • Orders are instantly set up after passing the automated fraud checks
  • Nodes are in OVH CA (see http://bhs.proof.ovh.net/ for looking glass)
  • Our terms of service apply
  • Try not to be a dick, everything is fair-share for this price point
  • Always remember to keep off-site backups
